description: ORDER_RAD_FILMS stores information entered about the number & size of films used when a radiology order is performed.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of films used/film size combinations entered.

columns.name: FILMS_USED
columns.description: The number of films used (of the size FILM_SIZE_C).

columns.name: FILM_SIZE_MR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The size of films category ID for films used (FILMS_USED).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


7" x 17"


8" x 10"


11" x 14"


14" x 14"


14" x 17"


24" x 24"


24" x 30"
